overview_of_class: Engineering mechanics applied to analyze human movement, including models of muscle and tendon, kinematics of joints, and dynamics of multijoint movement. Applications in sports, rehabilitation, and orthopedics.
name: Biomechanics of Movement
title: MEAS BMD_ENG 366-0-20 Biomechanics of Movement
